title: FF DIN; The history of the design of a contemporary typeface
content:
We like to invite you to take a look at the Encore Magazin:

[http://www.encore-mag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015060100/http:/www.encore-mag.com/ "http://www.encore-mag.com")

**FF DIN by Albert-Jan Pool | The history of the design of a contemporary typeface**

issues: 13, 14, 15, 17, 18 and 19 (interview).
author: patrick.s
